body.p: An entity shall disclose the following, if not disclosed elsewhere in information published with the financial statements:

li.p: the domicile and legal form of the entity, its country of incorporation and the address of its registered office (or principal place of business, if different from the registered office);
a description of the nature of the entity’s operations and its principal activities;
the name of the parent and the ultimate parent of the group; and
if it is a limited life entity, information regarding the length of its life.
